text: Shahidul Islam Khan is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and a former Jatiya Sangsad member representing the Sirajganj-5 constituency during 1988-1990. ==Personal life== In 16 September 2020, Khan's son, Asif Imtiaz Khan, a Supreme Court lawyer, died after falling from a building in Kathalbagan, Dhaka. ==References== Category:Living people Category:People from Sirajganj District Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Shahidul Islam Khan
